verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing, choirs of angels,
Sing in exultation,
Sing, all ye citizens of heaven above;
Glory to God
In the highest:

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yea, Lord, we greet Thee,
Born this happy morning,
Jesus, to Thee be glory given;
Word of the Father
Now in flesh appearing:

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord!
